The acceleration in the rate of statural growth begins with the first signs of puberty in girls (S2), and is delayed in boys (G3). The average pubertal growth peak is 20-25 cm in girls and 25-30 cm in boys.

question.title: What is the average increase in height during puberty?
question.description: What is the average increase in height during puberty?

option_a.title: 15-20 cm
option_a.description: The average increase in height during puberty for girls

option_b.title: 20-25 cm
option_b.description: The average increase in height during puberty for boys

option_c.title: 25-30 cm
option_c.description: The average increase in height during puberty for girls

option_d.title: 30-35 cm
option_d.description: The average increase in height during puberty for boys
